Html:
I'm writing XLSX2CSV.PHP, a utility which will read an XLSX file and... well, you can guess.

Basicly:

 

   $objReader = new PHPExcel_Reader_Excel2007();
   $objPHPExcel = $objReader->load($iFile);
   
   $objWriter = new PHPExcel_Writer_CSV($objPHPExcel);
   $objWriter->save("$oFile);

The input file contains multiple sheets, but the output file shows only the first one.  How does this work with a file with multiple sheets?
